fullText: The musical biography of Gloria and Emilio Estefan is a crowd-pleasing celebration of Latin music and culture, even if it hits familiar biographical beats.
dtliExcerpt: The musical biography of Gloria and Emilio Estefan is a crowd-pleasing celebration of Latin music and culture, even if it hits familiar biographical beats.
